analysis.description:
DepositSlot.collect (/unique_chucks/8/0x936f78b9852d12f5cb93177c1f84fb8513d06263.sol#86-94) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amount == 0

DepositSlot.collect (/unique_chucks/8/0x936f78b9852d12f5cb93177c1f84fb8513d06263.sol#86-94) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-TokenInterface(GNT).transfer(wrapper,amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x936f78b9852d12f5cb93177c1f84fb8513d06263.sol#93-94)

GolemNetworkTokenWrapped.withdrawGNT (/unique_chucks/8/0x936f78b9852d12f5cb93177c1f84fb8513d06263.sol#153-158) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-TokenInterface(GNT).transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x936f78b9852d12f5cb93177c1f84fb8513d06263.sol)

	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/8/0x936f78b9852d12f5cb93177c1f84fb8513d06263.sol#129-131)
